main event: A civilian reported observing a pale red cloud type object in the sky for about 4 minutes on September 13, 1966, in Hibbing, Minnesota.
interesting points: The observed object was described as resembling a translucent red cloud,The sighting coincided with a rocket launch from Fort Churchill, Canada, which produced cloud releases,Multiple weather observers confirmed sighting similar phenomena in the region around the same time,The object seemed stationary during observation and was reported at the Eveleth Weather Bureau,No physical evidence was detected during the investigation.
sighted object: a pale red cloud type object
witness description: a civilian and a certified weather observer
